statements: UPDATE access_control_lists SET permission = 'read' WHERE id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef'

UPDATE access_control_lists SET user_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-b456-426655440001', permission = 'write' WHERE resource = 'files';
